title: Nuclear energy - global market size by segment through 2030
summary: This grouped bar chart has 6 categories for the x axis of Power Type representing 2011, and 2030.
The highest category is found at Nuclear generation with a mean value of 216.5.
The second highest category is found at Radiation management with a mean value of 168.0.

data.Power Type: Spent nuclear fuel reprocessing and secondary fuel
